I VERY SPECIFICALLY told them to still send the order that was cash, NEVER BROUGHT THE FOOD. Not trying again. Done.

text: One of the best pizza spots in Erie. I really like the different flavors they use on their crust. If I‚Äôm in town, this is one of my top choices.  Erie has a lot of pizza options with a lot of competition. Hungry Bowie‚Äôs is always in the top tier of choices.

name: Madison Kennedy
text: When I'm on 12th Street and I'm hungry I typically walk right past this Hungry Howies, and dont look back. The last time I ordered a pizza from here and there was cleaner on it. Me and my family were sick for the next week. Never ordering from here again.

text: On time order. Fantastic pizza. I can't believe that more people don't go here.

text: The food was good. You cannot order less than 16 breadsticks which sucks when you just have two people dining in. The door to get back to the bathroom was locked and no code was provided for the door. The dining area is not ideal.
